entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
